entries.name: new(method, n) → WIN32OLE_PARAM objectclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns WIN32OLE_PARAM object which represents OLE parameter information. 1st argument should be WIN32OLE_METHOD object. 2nd argument `n' is n-th parameter of the method specified by 1st argument.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_PARAM#defaultclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns default value. If the default value does not exist, this method returns nil.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_PARAM#input?click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if the parameter is input.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_PARAM#inspect → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the parameter name with class name. If the parameter has default value, then returns name=value string with class name.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_PARAM#ole_typeclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns OLE type of WIN32OLE_PARAM object(parameter of OLE method).

entries.name: WIN32OLE_PARAM#ole_type_detailclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns detail information of type of argument.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_PARAM#optional?click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if argument is optional.

entries.name: WIN32OLE#output?click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if argument is output.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_PARAM#retval?click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if argument is return value.
